issue.title: AdGuard Cookie Notices filter is causing pizzafan.gr to be unusable

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

Filter version 2.0.25.64

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.pizzafan.gr/el

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. When a user visits the website, they cannot click anything on the website because a cookie notice blocks the user from doing so. AdGuard Cookie Notice filter blocks the cookie notice, but the blocking thing of that cookie notice is still left there. This prevents the user from accessing anything on the entire website, unless they disable uBlock Origin or the AdGuard Cookie Notice filter.

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1: AdGuard Cookie Notice filter disabled. The cookie notice is showing up, and scrolling is blocked.</summary>

![Screenshot from 2023-10-01 17-10-18](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/123986260/7d5faebd-1302-45a5-a86e-028bed806d3f)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2: AdGuard Cookie Notice filter enabled. The cookie notice is not showing up, but the website is still blocked.</summary>

![Screenshot from 2023-10-01 17-06-58](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/123986260/76285e60-4e06-49ea-81a3-b4e7f0c46f20)

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Fixed, update should be available in 2-3 hours.

comment.body:
> to me as a user, it is not transparent who maintains which filters

If you mean third-party filters, yeah, it might be confusing for the first time. However, most of them have a repo on gh.

> How would I file an issue for "Fanboy's Annoyances" on my own next time?

Like you mentioned before, using their forum. To be clear, it's one of the ways to report about the issue.
Actually, it's not necessary because they have [a gh repo](https://github.com/easylist/easylist/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+sort%3Aupdated-desc).

> Thanks for your explanation and patience

You are welcome!:)

comment.body:
Dear @zloyden,

to me as a user, it is not transparent who maintains which filters. The screenshot with the filtered elements was my only clue to what might be going wrong. I saw no "Fanboy's Annoyances" in my log when I klicked the "Blocked" filter, therefore it did not occur to me to check that one. I should have filtered by "Modified" as well, which I missed to do. Thanks for your explanation and patience.

How would I file an issue for "Fanboy's Annoyances" on my own next time? Thanks for telling the maintainer on my behalf, though.

comment.body:
@Alex-302 ,

1. Предположение: Google проводит A/B тестирование новой фичи на EU-юзерах. Google перевел меня с YouTube RU на YouTube ES через шесть месяцев непрерывного испозьзования Испанского IP на моем аккаунте. Так что, возможно, временное использование EU-IP по VPN ничего не даст.
2. Отправил Debug-логи AdGuard с указанием задачи на указанную почту. Баннер там тоже "выстрелил", смотрите в конец логов.
3. После включения консоли разработчика, баннеры исчезли. В т.ч. после выключения "persistent logs", очистки кэша, закрытия консоли, перезапуска браузера и логина-логаута. Антиотладка? Прошу не закрывать тикет (если, конично, вы баг не пофиксите): я приложо HAR-файл как только смогу.

comment.body:
Попробовал с разными европейскими IP - не повторяется.

Пожалуйста, запишите HAR-файл страницы и отправьте его + ссылку на эту задачу на `filters@adguard.com`.
Как получить HAR-файл:
https://toolbox.googleapps.com/apps/har_analyzer/

Для начала нужно открыть новую вкладку, потом инструменты разработчика, а дальше - по инструкции. Желательно без авторизации повторить.
Если повторите без авторизации - файл можно загрузить здесь.

Not reproduced it on my end.
Try do the following:
1. Enable EasyList Czech and Slovak
2. Clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.

If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

@Alex-302 , других – нет. Был дефолтовый с Firefox (strict-mode), отключил – не повлияло. В AdGuard сменил Cloudflare DNS (HTTPS) на AdGuard DNS (QUIC) – не повлияло.
Без AdGuard не появляется, но возникает реклама (предсказуемо).
Открыл (с AdGuard) четыре рандомных видео – в четвертом выскочило.

Возможно влияет то, что я физически нахожусь в Испании (Юг) и смотрю YouTube ES.

pull_request.title: Create devcontainer.json
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

# Creating the pull request > Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\ > If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\ > It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\ > Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it ## Prerequisites ### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms - [x] This is not an ad/bug report; - [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project; - [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes; - [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure. ## What problem does the pull request fix? ### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section - [x] Missed ads or ad leftovers; - [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly; - [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website; - [ ] Missed analytics or tracker; - [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc; - [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc; - [ ] Filters maintenance. ## What issue is being fixed? ### Enter the issue address https://newtongym8.com/g-gyouseisyosi.html ### Add your comment and screenshots Should I add the domain to this rule? `||platform.twitter.com/widgets.js$domain= `

comment.body:
> > cdn.reproio.comを許可すると
> 
> If this is true, at least we should unblock in contents filtering. But the app requires registration and apparently I have to go to an actual shop according to the comment?

アプリに会員登録は必要です。が、登録に実店舗に行く必要はありません。実店舗に行くとQRコードが貼ってあり、それを読み取るためにアプリ内でカメラを起動させるのですが、その起動操作が出来ないということです。

issue.title: wogaa.sg
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://wogaa.sg/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwogaa.sg%2F) ### Comment > WOGAA.sg is Singapore's government website to host some of Singapore's government services. I was having trouble making payment for a government related service because fetching a Javascript from the domain came with an error. On browser webpage inspection, the GET function threw a ERR_ADDRESS_INVALID error, and I double checked the main site domain with all my browsers it also came with the same error. On troubleshooting with a proxy server, the website showed up again. I believe AdGuard either has wrongly blocked this domain and should be marked as safe or the domain is not found on its domain name server list. ### Screenshots
